name: Time Traveler's Diary
description: Send messages through the fabric of time
timeQuotes: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time' is like saying 'I don't want to'.
The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour.
Time is the longest distance between two places.
The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God.
Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
The clock is running. Make the most of today.
timeParadoxWarnings: Some timelines are better left untouched
Time is fragile, handle with care
